message.raw: Fix for memory leak of static memory allocated in the OPCODE collider. Applications must ensure to call dCloseODE before running memory leak checking functions.
message.html: Fix for memory leak of static memory allocated in the OPCODE collider. Applications must ensure to call dCloseODE before running memory leak checking functions.
